alert.note: Alert for Cuyama Valley; San Luis Obispo County Interior Valleys; San Luis Obispo County Mountains; Santa Barbara County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 14 at 9:46AM PST until December 14 at 8:00PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM PST THIS EVENING... ...HIGH WIND WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Southwest to northwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. Isolated gusts to 60 mph possible in the hills. * WHERE...San Luis Obispo County Interior Valleys, Cuyama Valley, San Luis Obispo County Mountains and Santa Barbara County Mountains. * WHEN...Until 8 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Roadways may be affected by gusty cross winds.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Cuyama Valley; San Luis Obispo County Interior Valleys; San Luis Obispo County Mountains; Santa Barbara County Mountains
